name: El Mago - Miami Pepe
additionalNotes: The Mago Cigars, founded in 2022 by Nicholas Fusco, CEO of the company, offers a selection of handmade cigars with a distinctive Cuban look, feel and taste. Fusco created this brand in honor of his grandparents, Maria and Gonzalo Torre, who overcame numerous challenges in their lives. Owners of the James Hotel in the iconic Art Deco district of Miami Beach, Florida, Nicholas' grandfather used to enjoy cigars in the hotel lobby. The companyâ€™s name, El Mago, comes from the first two letters of their grandparents' names and also means "El Mago" in Spanish.
